title: Panthers join NFC elite and is it Teddy Time?
itunes:title: Panthers join NFC elite and is it Teddy Time?
description:
A room filled with some heroes- Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Gregg Rosenthal and Colleen Wolfe recap the Monday night matchup between the Dolphins and Panthers (3:00); Suggestions on how to improve the schedule for prime time games (10:00); News from around the league, including Danny Amendola and Julian Edelman’s interesting promo for NFL in Mexico (22:20); Will the Cowboys be alright despite their recent string of bad luck? (24:00); The Giants’ statement about head coach Ben McAdoo (27:00); Rosenthal and Hanzus go toe-to-toe on whether the Titans are a legitimate AFC contender (46:00); Plus, listener iTunes reviews (54:00) and more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
